mapper.insert: insert into t_gantt (id, parent_id, description, duration, expanded, is_live, leaf, progress, sort, start_date, title) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{expanded,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isLive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{leaf,jdbcType=BIT}, #{progress,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_gantt set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, expanded = #{expanded,jdbcType=BIT}, is_live = #{isLive,jdbcType=BIT}, leaf = #{leaf,jdbcType=BIT}, progress = #{progress,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_gantt
id,
parent_id,
description,
duration,
expanded,
is_live,
leaf,
progress,
sort,
start_date,
title,

mapper.update:
update t_gantt
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
expanded = #{expanded,jdbcType=BIT},
is_live = #{isLive,jdbcType=BIT},
leaf = #{leaf,jdbcType=BIT},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, description, duration, expanded, is_live, leaf, progress, sort, start_date, title from t_gantt where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, parent_id, description, duration, expanded, is_live, leaf, progress, sort, start_date, title from t_gantt
select id, parent_id, description, duration, expanded, is_live, leaf, progress, sort, start_date, title from t_gantt where parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, parent_id, description, duration, expanded, is_live, leaf, progress, sort, start_date, title from t_gantt where stem LIKE #{pattern}
select id, parent_id, description, duration, expanded, is_live, leaf, progress, sort, start_date, title from t_gantt where stem = #{stem}
